overview: A documentary that benefits from the direct participation of STD/AIDS prevention agents from the Rainbow Citizenship project, of the Municipal Health Secretariat, who work with their peers, the gay public, in various regions of São Paulo. By providing a greater knowledge of the gay universe in the city, the documentary favors the debate, the reflection on the situation of vulnerability of men who have sex with men, enables a greater understanding of reality and contributes to a better confrontation of the HIV/AIDS epidemic in the city of São Paulo.
title: Um Lugar Para Beijar
